org.opensaml.messaging.decoder.servlet

Interface HttpServletRequestMessageDecoder<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the message type of the message context on which to operate
    All Superinterfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, MessageDecoder<MessageType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHttpServletRequestMessageDecoder, BaseHttpServletRequestXMLMessageDecoder

    public interface HttpServletRequestMessageDecoder<MessageType>
extends MessageDecoder<MessageType>
    A specialization of MessageDecoder that operates on a source message data type of HttpServletRequest.
